```{r}
# Feature Selection

# installing packages

install.packages("daltoolboxdp")
```

```{r}
# loading DAL
library(daltoolbox)
library(daltoolboxdp)
```


```{r}
# General function for exploring feature selection methods

iris <- datasets::iris
```

```{r}
# Lasso

myfeature <- fit(fs_lasso("Species"), iris)
print(myfeature$features)
data <- transform(myfeature, iris)
print(head(data))
```
